content: the pattern is available for free on my blog > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** the video tutorial is available for free here https //youtu be/kypxos9dyjg **about the pattern** the crochet large berry stitch has a beautiful texture it creates a thick textured fabric crochet c2c is my favorite way of working blankets and washcloths it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go **skill level** - intermediate **crochet terminology** - the pattern is written using english u s terminology **materials needed** - hook size needed 4 0 mm / g - the project is crocheted with dk #3 weight yarn but the pattern can be worked with any yarn weight with a suitable crochet hook - total amount of yarn needed 40gr/90m/98yds - 2 stitch markers optional **finished size** - for the amount of yarn written 6 5×6 5 16 5×16 5 cm ** you can choose to make the pattern as a rectangle or a square and work it as big as you d like if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2024 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design this pdf pattern is free from viruses and safe to use it includes links to reputable websites however users should exercise caution when accessing external links from unknown sources gpsr representative ciara doyle c15 y5f9 ireland ciara@thefairythorn ie 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
